html:
7.7.17  4:14 pm   Produce more content, please!

     i am producing as much as i can, and have been for quite some time

7.7.17  4:05 pm   Hey I subscribed after your history of the world video, which makes me ask why didn't you put ads on it?

     kills the vibe, big time
7.7.17  4:05 pm   Why did you specifically choose Japan for History Of Japan instead of any other country.

7.7.17  4:02 pm   are these questions really being answered?

     yes
7.7.17  3:55 pm   Why is 240 on your wall?

7.7.17  3:34 pm   what role did randomization play in hi im steve?

     none

7.7.17  3:31 pm   what is your opinion on cacti

     needless to say, my opinions on cacti are too controversial to be stated here

7.7.17  2:55 pm   you have been visited by the Damn Demands fairy. All demands made onto you have been Damned, the slate is now blank.

     oh nice

7.7.17  2:31 pm   Are you aware that people are impersonating you and scamming people in the comments of 'hi, I'm Steve'?

     yes

     If so, what are you doing to stop them?

     deleting them. and then deleting them again when they come back. and then deleting them again when they come back

7.7.17  2:28 pm   why is everything confusing 

     to keep it interesting

7.7.17  2:23 pm   why is old music so good

     because the world has had time to forget the stuff that's not worth remembering, leaving only the best stuff
7.7.17  2:09 pm   where can i buy an invisible drumset like yours?

7.7.17  2:02 pm   how did you come up with your aesthetic?

     i'm just trying to be reasonable

7.7.17  1:56 pm   how do i type a question

     so far you are doing great

7.7.17  1:48 pm   wait send help i ran out ot cheese

     why send help, why not send cheese

7.7.17  1:30 pm   Can god create a boulder so heavy that he cannot lift it?

      'god' or 'ogd' as i sometimes call it, already made and lifted everything in advance. this is actually the default setting, so it didn't take a lot of work

7.7.17  1:23 pm   How did you choose the text colours for your website (bonus round: how do you choose them for your videos)?

     i choose colors based on how they look (visually). that might not be the best way but that's just how i do it
7.7.17  1:04 pm   why did u leave out Scientology from we can make religions out of this

7.7.17  12:58 pm   why is it important to create patterns then break them in the creative process?

     it's fun

7.7.17  12:49 pm   You use autotune in your jingels?

     no

     
And is there a meaning to your videos?

     yes

     If so what is it?

     the meaning is "hey check out this video i made"

7.7.17  12:02 pm   Are you having a nice break after spending so long on a video?

     no i have actually been making content ever since the long video (history of the entire world) was released

7.7.17  11:57 am   Will you ignore my question

     i will see what i can do

7.7.17  11:53 am   HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT ME USING CAPITAL LETTERS IN A COMPLETELY CASUAL SENTENCE?

     fine. it shows character

7.7.17  11:20 am   Is the stamp you put on the floor in "I'm gonna mail you my floor" still on your floor?

     no

7.7.17  11:09 am   Are you an egotistical maniac who watches his own videos after they are released?

     i never watch them after they are released

7.7.17  10:22 am   yes but how about the happiest chord? or the most green one?

     the chords are not ranked in that way. how a chord feels depend on how and when it's used

7.7.17  10:09 am   All the instrements on your songs are played by you?

     yes

7.7.17  8:11 am   will you ever appear in your videos anymore in the future?

     oh hell yeah

7.7.17  7:47 am   red or blue who wins?

     are you sure they are competing

7.7.17  7:32 am   Can you bring back icy james??

     it did not leave

7.7.17  5:59 am   have you ever considered modding people on your channel to fight the rising number of people impersonating you on your comments

     yes

7.7.17  5:48 am   Why did you use lowercase letters for "history of the entire world, i guess"'s title?

     to match history of japan's title

7.7.17  5:34 am   Knock knock

     come in

7.7.17  4:14 am   do you prefer have one or two  money ?

     2

7.7.17  3:20 am   People got mad that you didnt include canada in history of the entire world i guess... what are your thoughts

     it's impossible to mention everything there ever was, in a 19 minute video. leaving out canada was actually a deliberate misdirect to distract from all the 1000s of other things i had to skip, just to make the entire history of the universe from big bang to present actually fit in less than 20 minutes and more importantly be produceable in less than a year

7.7.17  2:39 am   did you know you spelt questions wrong?

     no

7.7.17  2:33 am   Is it okay to have a baby even before you are born? 

     ah yes, i thought you'd never ask

7.7.17  2:03 am   so let's say we're playing a tune and a c7b9 chord comes along.  what scale do you sing over it

     i'd prefer to sing something more musical than a scale. but it depends how the song goes

7.7.17  1:55 am   thoughts on atonality?

     just when you think something's atonal, there is slways someone around to say 'nope that's tonal. atonal music has to be Less tonal' so i would guess the sound of jackhammer is atonal but i will have to check with the atonality police

7.7.17  1:47 am   do you like typing in caps ?? 

     sometimes
7.7.17  1:25 am   Btw why does your "thank you" page says "thabk you" instead? Is it intentional or misspelled?

7.7.17  1:22 am   Did you plan doing "hi, i'm steve" while making hotewig?

     no

7.7.17  1:21 am   To what degree is the gear you have important in what you do?

     not at all. it just matters that i have something. it really doesn't matter which things

7.7.17  12:58 am   Why do I always feel like there is a deeper meaning to your videos?

     i try to make the videos as meaningful as possible. but i have liquified the meaning. so as not to mean 1 particular thing or another. it is liquid meaning. i have found that it is more potent that way

7.7.17  12:44 am   Whats the most normal thing you've done in your life

     try to figure out what the heck is going on

7.7.17  12:33 am   Will you ever do another huge project like History of the entire world or are you going to continue with your random vids? I personally like them both.

     i would like to explore a wide range of types of content

7.7.17  12:26 am   what are your thoughts on musicals

     you might find a song or two

7.7.17  12:23 am   what was the inspiration to "hi, i'm steve"?

      make a fictional / free video that is longer than 45 seconds

7.7.17  12:11 am   will you cover blue rondo a la turk by that dave guy

     i would consider it

7.7.17  12:10 am   Hi Bill .?. Hope you're doing great. I'm wondering if you use isochronic tones or binaural beats in your music. It's pretty dope how your music makes me feel like you're massaging my brain. Thanks so much for sharing your music with us. Try not to worry about how fast or in which order you will get it all done in. What matters is that you're actually doing it.
And also, I love you

     i have never heard the word 'isochronic' or 'binaural' before. i'm not sure if that answers your question
